# Centering predictors in `lm()`



 


```{r}
schoolmot <- read_csv("https://uoepsy.github.io/data/schoolmot.csv")

smod3 <- lmer(grade ~ motiv + (1 + motiv | schoolid), 
              data = schoolmot)

schoolmot <-
  schoolmot |> group_by(schoolid) |>
  mutate(
    mm = mean(motiv),
    md = motiv-mean(motiv)
  )

smod4 <- lmer(grade ~ (mm + md) + (1 + md | schoolid), 
              data = schoolmot)

```
